Header.title: Akinos Consulting
Header.paragraph: Akinos Consulting provides data analysis, web scraping and automation solutions for small teams and individuals.

paragraph: Akinos Consulting was formed to bring enterprise quality data analytics and automation solutions to small teams and individuals.
We provide comprehensive data collection services including web scraping of unstructured/public data and working with complex APIs to access large databases.
We transform raw data into digestible visualizations, allowing clients to make data-driven decisions.
Akinos Consulting also provides automation services for data entry, social media engagement and other repetitive, web-based tasks.

Services.name: Automation
Services.text: We automate repetitive tasks like data entry, social media posting and other back-end or web-based processes.

Services.name: Data Collection
Services.text: We can extract data directly from the web or navigate complex APIs to analyze public data or create proprietary data.

Services.name: Data Analysis
Services.text: We produce stunning visualizations and valuable statistical analysis to create actionable insights for the client.
